title: The Crab Den
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:night-rush-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-trans-pride |trans-pride-logo= --]]]

[[module CSS]]
.heading h1 {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #f2f2f2;
}
.heading.nagi-section {
  margin-top: 75px;
}
#page-content > .blockquote + p {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
#page-content > .blockquote + p + p {
  margin-top: 0;
}

.nagi-table {
  background: black;
  width: 100%;
  border-spacing: 4px;
  margin: 75px 0;
}
.nagi-collab {
  border-top: 1px solid #f2f2f2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #f2f2f2;
  padding: 1em 0;
}
.nagi-collab .collapsible-block-link, .nagi-collab .collapsible-block-unfolded-link, .nagi-collab .collapsible-block-folded {
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 125%;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.nagi-bottom {
  height: 25px;
}
.entry-cell {
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 0px 0px 4px black;
  padding: 0 10px;
  background: #383838;
}
.entry-cell.dark {
  background: #2e2e2e;
}
.entry-cell.entry-number {
  font-size: 200%;
  width: 25%;
}

@supports ((-webkit-background-clip: text) and (-webkit-text-fill-color: transparent)) {

  /*  Hey, this is some cool CSS I made! Please don't use it outside of your own author page. Tech has already soft-denied my request to make this a useable component.  */

  /*  If you need, I can walk you through the process of applying this color gradient across Wikidot (on your end) or just making modifications to it. Please reach out if you have questions.  */

  /*  ME  */
  span.printuser.avatarhover a[href="http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/nagiros"]:nth-child(2),
  #scpper-page-info a[href="http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/nagiros"] {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,244,48,1) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 50%, rgba(156,89,209,1) 100%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
}
[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
//It's Now & Never: a reverie endeavor
Awaits somnambulant directives
To take the helm.//

[...]

//Joy mirage's kingdom come, no one left at stake.
Now that existence is on the wake,
Let's see what we can make.//

[[>]]
**‚Äî Hatsune Miku**
[[/>]]
[[/div]]

[!--
[[html]]
<style type="text/css">
div.btn-container {
    width: 100%;
    min-width: 150px!important;
    display: flex!important;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 0.5em 0;
}

div.btn-container > a {
    margin: 0 auto;
    transition-property: -webkit-backdrop-filter, backdrop-filter, box-shadow, background-color;
    transition-duration: 300ms;
    transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1);
    -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-backdrop-filter, backdrop-filter, box-shadow, background-color;
    -webkit-transition-duration: 300ms;
    -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1);
    background-color: #cc9cff !important;
}

div.btn-container > a:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 0.188rem 0.25rem rgba(235, 235, 235, 0.1);
    text-decoration: none;
}

div.btn-container > a > span {
    color: #272727!important;
}
</style>
<script type='text/javascript' src='https://ko-fi.com/widgets/widget_2.js'></script><script type='text/javascript'>kofiwidget2.init('Support me on Ko-Fi', '#272727', 'nagiros');kofiwidget2.draw();</script>
[[/html]]
= //I'm chronically poor so any help is extremely appreciated//
--]

[[/table]]

[[div class="heading"]]
+* Who I Am
[[/div]]

Hello.

My name's [[*user Nagiros]], although I also use Nagi for short. I've got a lot to learn about this site and life in general.

I'm most well-known for making a lot of contributions to the [[[Site-17 Hub | Site-17 Deepwell Catalog]]] and creating and (formerly) maintaining the [[[Esoteric Classes Complete List | Comprehensive List of Esoteric Classes]]]. I have aspirations of doing more ‚Äî I want to be prolific and have a formidable backlog of content I can be proud of. I want to inspire others.

We'll see.
